result.title: The Tough Summer Spar 2016 22 July 2016 1200 UTC
result.content:
We are pleased to announce you that we are going to host a long contest on Toph, a Bangladeshi contest platform. The contest will have 12 problems. It will start at 1200 UTC and will continue for 10 days. Scoring follows ACM-ICPC rules. Here's the registration link: register

The setters are: TarifEzaz, Labib666, flash_7, _Kryptonyte_ and jackal_1586.

We would like to thank hjr265 and his team for this awesome platform.

We hope everyone will find the problems very interesting to solve. Good luck and have fun.

UPD: Winners and Editorial
